page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT _FORRES EAST
page.content: EMPLOYMENT IS WHEN PEOPLE GO OUT TO WORK.MOST PEOPLE WORK FROM 9AM TO 5.30 PM . FORRES HAS LOTS OF UNEMPLOYMENT. EMPLOYMENT IS WHEN PEOPLE GO OUT TO WORK FOR MONEY ,BUT NOT ALL PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED . SOME PEOPLE DON'T GET EMPLOYED BECAUSE THEY ARE NOT GOOD ENOUGH FOR THE JOB . PEOPLE THAT ARE EMPLOYED MIGHT WORK IN SOME OF THESE JOBS SUCH AS WORKING IN A PETROL STATION , BUS SERVICE, PUBLIC BAR,INN HOTEL, SHOPS, SMALL HOSPITAL ,CHURCH AND CHAPEL.IN ALL THESE JOBS YOU WON'T GET THE SAME AMOUNT OF MONEY AS OTHERS . THERE IS A LOT OF PEOPLE EMPLOYED IN THIS COUNTRY WHICH ARE IN THE R.A.F. THE R.A.F. MEANS ROYAL AIR FORCE ,WHERE PEOPLE GO OUT TO DEFEND OUR COUNTRY. SOME PEOPLE OPEN THEIR OWN BUSINESS AND THEY EMPLOY PEOPLE FOR WORKING THERE.
